description.english: Die for the first time
description.german: Stirb zum ersten Mal
description.french: Mourez pour la première fois
description.italian: Muori per la prima volta
description.spanish: Muere por primera vez.
description.schinese: 在游戏中第一次死亡
description.russian: Умрите в первый раз
description.japanese: 初めて死んだ
description.polish: Umierasz pierwszy raz
description.brazilian: Morra pela primeira vez

displayName.brazilian: Mais rápido que a velocidade da luz

description.english: Reach the max combo multiplier during the first section of a level
description.german: Erreiche im ersten Abschnitt eines Levels den maximalen Kombo-Multiplikator
description.french: Atteignez le multiplicateur de combo maximum pendant la première section d'un niveau
description.italian: Raggiungi il moltiplicatore combo max nella prima sezione di un livello
description.spanish: Alcanza el multiplicador de combo máximo durante el primer sector de un nivel.
description.koreana: 레벨의 첫 번째 구역에서 최대 콤보 배수에 도달하기
description.schinese: 在关卡的第一阶段达到最大连击倍率
description.russian: Достигните максимального множителя комбо за первую секцию уровня
description.japanese: ステージの第1セクションのあいだに、最大コンボボーナスに達する
description.polish: Osiągnij najwyższy mnożnik sekwencji na pierwszym odcinku poziomu
description.brazilian: Atinja o multiplicador de combo máximo durante a primeira seção de um nível

description.english: Finish a level without taking any damage
description.german: Schließe ein Level ab, ohne Schaden zu erleiden
description.french: Finissez un niveau sans subir de dégâts
description.italian: Completa un livello senza subire danni
description.spanish: Termina un nivel sin recibir daño.
description.koreana: 아무 피해도 받지 않고 레벨 완료하기
description.schinese: 不受任何伤害完成一个关卡
description.russian: Закончите уровень, не получив урона
description.japanese: ダメージを一切受けずにステージをクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ jeden z poziomów, nie odnosząc obrażeń
description.brazilian: Conclua um nível sem receber danos

description.english: Replay a level and beating his own level best score
description.german: Wiederhole ein Level und schlage deinen Highscore
description.french: Rejouez un niveau et battez votre meilleur score
description.italian: Rigioca un livello e supera il tuo punteggio migliore
description.spanish: Vuelve a jugar un nivel y supera tu puntuación máxima.
description.koreana: 레벨을 다시 플레이하여 자신의 최고 득점 돌파하기
description.schinese: 重玩一个关卡并打破自己的最高分
description.russian: Пройдите уровень заново и побейте свой рекорд
description.japanese: ステージを再度プレイし、自分のハイスコアを超える
description.polish: Powtórz jeden z poziomów i pobij swój rekord
description.brazilian: Jogue um nível novamente e supere seu recorde anterior

description.english: Defeat the boss 1 for the first time
description.german: Besiege den Wächter
description.french: Vaincre le gardien
description.italian: Sconfiggi il guardiano
description.spanish: Derrota al guardián.
description.schinese: 击败守护者
description.russian: Победите стража
description.japanese: ガーディアンを倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj strażnika
description.brazilian: Derrote o guardião

description.english: Finish a level with at least one difficulty increase modifier
description.german: Meistere ein Level mit mind. einem Schwierigkeitsmodifikator
description.french: Terminez un niveau avec au moins un modificateur d'augmentation de difficulté
description.spanish: Termina un nivel con al menos un modificador de aumento de dificultad.
description.koreana: 난이도 상승 보정치를 1개 이상 사용하고 레벨 완료하기
description.italian: Completa un livello con almeno un modificatore di aumento difficoltà
